INSERT INTO member(member_id, name, nickname, member_passwd, member_address, gender, birth_date, email) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{memberPasswd}, #{memberAddress}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{email})
SELECT TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, name, nickname, hobby, interest, member_address, gender, birth_date, introduce, picture, store_picture, member_passwd, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate FROM member WHERE member_id = #{value}

SELECT member_id, name, nickname, hobby, interest, member_address, gender, birth_date, introduce, picture, store_picture, member_passwd, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate FROM member WHERE nickname = #{value}

SELECT member_id, name, nickname, hobby, interest, member_address, gender, birth_date, introduce, picture, store_picture, member_passwd, email, grade, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_passwd = #{memberPasswd}
SELECT member_id, name, email, nickname, grade, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regdate FROM member ORDER BY regdate DESC

SELECT member_id, name, nickname, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regdate FROM member WHERE member_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY regdate DESC
